medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced abdominal pain 10 days prior to admission, which was diagnosed as pancreatitis. She developed severe epigastric pain two days before admission, somewhat more superior to the previous pain. Pain improved with pain medication. The patient had ten bowel movements and had emesis at home. There were no identifiable aggravating or alleviating factors.
medical_history.family_history: No known family history of malignancy.
